title: "Heads up: Changes to Excel workbook support in Power BI workspaces"
excerpt: "We are announcing the deprecation of some features for Excel workbooks in Power BI workspaces. This can impact organizations and users who use these capabilities. This blog outlines the changes, the timelines for deprecation, and how to update your workbooks. It also explains how to determine what workbooks"
